name: Arc Sys Battle Climax
description:
Hello.

This is a local Multiplayer only fan game using various assets and characters of Arc System Works Project. Made for the most part during quarantine. (No CPU)

This is a small project I created during the second year of my university. I am not very good at art so I took various resources from Arc System Works games and mashed together a simple fighter. Hope you like it ^^.

If enough requests are there I will release the Game Maker Studio 2 Project files for anyone to edit and make their game based upon this. I do not own any of Arc System Works assets this is simply a fan-game and is not supposed to be distributed for money. This fan game and the project files will always remain free for anyone to download.

Highly recommend using 4 Gamepad's and playing with 4 players. Keyboard Support is also available but not recommended. Download the attached Keyboard Config file for the Keyboard controls as they are not displayed inside the game.

Hope you all like the game and please support Arc System Works and their properties. They make amazing fighting games.
